ptxt.intxrefpoff: Parking Brake Shoe Removal and Installation:Disc

servinfosub.title: Brake shoe
servinfosub.ptxt: Measure the minimum thickness of brake shoe lining (1). Also, check surface of lining for hardening, excessive wear and oil.

servinfosub.title: Brake shoe Adjuster
servinfosub.ptxt: Check thread or ratchet of brake shoes adjuster for wear, sticking and corrosion. If defective is found, replace brake shoe adjuster (1).

servinfosub.title: Parking Brake Shoe Operating Lever
servinfosub.ptxt: Inspect parking brake shoe operating lever (1) for free movement against brake shoe web. If defective is found, correct or replace.

servinfosub.title: Springs
servinfosub.ptxt: Inspect for damage or weakening. Inspect each part with arrow for rust. If found defective is found, replace.
